source-layers.sql: SELECT the_geom_webmercator, CASE WHEN fld_zone IN ('A', 'A0', 'AE') THEN 'A' WHEN fld_zone = 'VE' THEN 'V' END as fld_zone FROM floodplain_firm2007 WHERE fld_zone IN ('A', 'A0', 'AE') OR fld_zone = 'VE'

SELECT the_geom_webmercator, CASE WHEN fld_zone IN ('A', 'A0', 'AE') THEN 'A' WHEN fld_zone = 'VE' THEN 'V' WHEN fld_zone = '0.2 PCT ANNUAL CHANCE FLOOD HAZARD' THEN 'Shaded X' END as fld_zone FROM floodplain_pfirm2015 WHERE fld_zone IN ('A', 'A0', 'AE') OR fld_zone = 'VE'

meta.description: Flood Insurance Rate Data provided by FEMA
